tasks.reset-with-delete-task-description: You can specify another task or exit the task deletion mode by clicking to button bellow.
tasks.info-line:
ID: {{taskId}},
User: {{userId}},
Will be call at: {{date}},
{{regular_desctription}}
tasks.description-time: Enter the time of the task call in the format 2:22
tasks.description-timezone: About timezone you can read here link to wiki
tasks.description-weather: Enter the time of the task call, the city name and timezone in format: 02:22 - Batumi - asia/tbilisi
tasks.description-reminder: Enter the time of the task call, the message and timezone in format: 02:22 - My message here - asia/tbilisi
tasks.description-exchange: Enter the time of the task call, the pair of currencies and timezone in format: 02:22 - usd rub - asia/tbilisi

options.exchange: Write the pair of currencies (usd rub)

update.make-regular-description: Do you want to make task regular?
update.options: You can choice additional parameter for task
update.error: Something went wrong when updating task

store.error: Something went wrong when creating task

delete.error: Something went wrong when deletin task

weather.reset-with-description: You can specify another city or exit the weather query mode by clicking to button bellow.
weather.get-description: To get the weather, enter the city in Russian or English.

tasks.delete-description: Enter the task id you want to delete!
tasks.update-description: Enter the task id you want to update!
tasks.remove-option-description: To delete a subtask, select the appropriate item

settings.update-title: Select the setting you want to update.

exchange.change: Specify the currency the exchange rate of which you want to get.
exchange.reset-with-description: You can specify another pair in the same format or exit by clicking on the button at the bottom.
